testcases.name: listdevices
testcases.description: Get list of available devices in the controller

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of remain battery of First Alert Smoke and Carbon Monoxide (unit %)

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of REPORT_GROUP for verifying which device is available in group report

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set ASSOCIATION REPORT_GROUP, this case is our controller,First Alert Smoke and Carbon Monoxide will send notification to controller whenever having smoke/co detected event occurs

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of REPORT_GROUP for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of BEEPER (allow First Alert Smoke and Carbon Monoxide to send double alarm message to controller) for verifying value which is available

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 1 to BEEPER , value 1 means allow First Alert Smoke and Carbon Monoxide to send double alarm message to controller when it detected smoke/co

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of BEEPER for verifying value which we have set before

testcases.name: writespec
testcases.description: Set value 0 to BEEPER , value 0 means First Alert Smoke and Carbon Monoxide just to send one alarm message to controller when it detected smoke/co

testcases.name: readspec
testcases.description: Get status of BEEPER for verifying value which we have set before
